Detailed Description

Function Documentation

Int32 BspUtils_appLoadFileFromSd ( const Char *  fileName,
const Char *  dirName,
void *  bufAddr,
UInt32  bufSize,
UInt32 *  bytesRead 
)

Function to load buffers from file in sd card.

Parameters
fileName[IN] File name string.
dirName[IN] Directory name string.
bufAddr[IN] Address of buffer to load the file content.
bufSize[IN] Size of buffer to load the file content.
bytesRead[OUT] Returns number of bytes read from file.
Int32 BspUtils_appSaveFileToSd ( const Char *  fileName,
const Char *  dirName,
const void *  bufAddr,
UInt32  bufSize,
UInt32 *  bytesWritten 
)

Function to save buffers to file in SD card.

Parameters
fileName[IN] File name string.
dirName[IN] Directory name string.
bufAddr[IN] Address of buffer to save in file
bufSize[IN] Size of buffer to save the content in file.
bytesWritten[OUT] Returns number of bytes written to file.
Int32 BspUtils_deinitFileio ( void  )

Function to deinitialize sd card.

Returns
BSP_SOK on success else appropiate error code on failure.
Int32 BspUtils_initFileio ( void *  hEdma)

Function to initialize sd card.

Parameters
hEdma[IN] handle for edma3lld.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success else appropiate error code on failure.
